text: On uchredil dlya vas v religii zakon, Kotoryy byl zaveshchan Nukhu, - Tot, chto vnusheniyem tebe My nisposlali I chto zaveshchan Ibrakhimu, (A sledom) Muse i (pozdneye) Ise: "V religii blyudite stoykost' I v ney yedinstvo sokhranyayte!" Dlya mnogobozhnikov - kak tyazhko to, K chemu ty prizyvayesh' ikh! K Sebe Bog izbirayet tekh, kto etogo zhelayet, K Sebe vedet togo, kto obrashchen k Nemu
